title: Nesting Dolls
description: Nesting dolls, also called matryoshka dolls or Russian dolls, decorated with bright colors including red, yellow, blue, and green. All platforms depict the nesting dolls as open, revealing smaller dolls within the bases of larger dolls. Dolls are all decorated with women wearing headscarfs. Some platforms show a flower motif on the women's dresses or aprons.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the nesting dolls emoji presents a vibrant and intricately detailed set, showcasing a progression of sizes with characteristic Russian folk art charm. Each doll features bright, cheerful colors and a smooth, slightly glossy finish, characteristic of Apple's approach to object design, with subtle 3D shading that gives them a tactile feel. This charming collection, seen on Apple devices, symbolizes family, tradition, hidden depths, and the joy of discovery.
